title: "Windows 10’s fall 2021 feature update is a step closer to launch"
excerpt: "Windows 10 version 21H2 is the next major release version and it’s now available for pre-release validation with commercial PCs in the Release Preview Channel. This will allow PCs managed IT administrators to download and run Windows 10 version 21H2 update for testing ahead of its October 2021 release."
